Tas Montblanc Lecet, Distributor Indonesia Dihukum Ganti Rugi Konsumen Rp 6 Juta
01 Nov 2019, 13:19 by Andi Saputra
Jakarta - Montblanc Indonesia dihukum untuk mengganti rugi kepada konsumen David Tobing sebesar Rp 6 juta rupiah. Sebab, tas yang dibeli David Tobing lecet.
Kasus bermula saat David Tobing membeli tas Bag Med Wst Clth Zip Blck 1046 model no 104611 di Plaza Senayan pada 2015 seharga Rp 6 juta. Belakangan, tas itu lecet dan terjadi perbedaan warna. Dari hitam mengkilap menjadi hitam doff. Warna yang keluar juga bukan warna hitam tapi hijau kecokelatan.
David sudah komplain tapi selama 2 tahun tidak ada tanggapan yang memuaskan. Akhirnya David melayangkan gugaran kepada distributor Montblanc Indonesia, PT Sumaco Wahana Utama pada September 2019.
Kasus ini diadili dengan sistem peradilan sederhana. Pada 28 Oktober 2019, PN Jaksel mengabulkan gugatan tersebut.
"Menyatakan produk tergugat adalah produk cacat. Menghukum tergugat untuk membayar ganti rugi Rp 6 juta," demikian bunyi putusan hakim tunggal, Suharno.
Atas putusan itu, David Tobing yang sehari-hari pengacara tersebut mengucapkan apresiasi terhadap PN Jaksel. Diharapkan putusan itu menjadi pembelajaran bagi pelaku usaha.
""Saya sejak 2015 telah berulang kali mengajukan pengaduan kepada Tergugat terkait kerusakan tas saya hingga akhimya pada tahun 2017 dijanjikan akan dikabari tindak lanjutnya namun selama 2 tahun tidak ada tanggapan maupun penyelesaian terhadap pengaduan yang saya ajukan, sehingga guna penyelesaian permasalahan tersebut saya ajukan gugatan," ujar David saat dihubungi detikcom, Jumat (1/11/2019).

Montblanc Bag Lecet, Indonesian Distributor Sentenced to Compensate Consumer Damage of IDR 6 Million
Nov 01 2019, 13:19 by Andi Saputra
Jakarta - Montblanc Indonesia was sentenced to compensate David consumers for Rp6 million rupiah. Because, the bag that David Tobing bought was scratched.
The case began when David Tobing bought a bag Med Wst Clth Zip Blck 1046 model no. 104611 at Plaza Senayan in 2015 for Rp 6 million. Later, the bag was chafed and there was a difference in color. From glossy black to black matte. The color that comes out is also not black but brownish green.
David has complained but for 2 years there was no satisfactory response. Finally David sent a restoration to Montblanc Indonesia's distributor, PT Sumaco Wahana Utama in September 2019.
This case was tried with a simple justice system. On October 28, 2019, South Jakarta District Court granted the suit.
"Declaring the defendant's product is a defective product. Punishing the defendant to pay compensation of Rp. 6 million," reads the decision of a single judge, Suharno.
Upon the verdict, David Tobing, who is a lawyer everyday, expressed his appreciation for the South Jakarta District Court. It is hoped that the decision will become a learning process for business actors.
"" I have repeatedly filed complaints to the Defendant since 2015 related to the damage to my bag until finally in 2017 it was promised to be informed of the follow-up but for 2 years there was no response or resolution to the complaint I submitted, so in order to resolve the problem I filed a lawsuit, "said David when contacted by AFP on Friday (11/01/2019).
